AutoVariable.label: Bhop chance
AutoVariable.tooltip: % chance of a successful bunnyhop

AutoVariable.label: Enable FollowBot
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically follow other players

AutoVariable.label: Roaming
AutoVariable.tooltip: Look for someone to follow when there is not active target.

AutoVariable.label: Change when possible
AutoVariable.tooltip: Allows more changing of follow targets

AutoVariable.label: Synced taunts
AutoVariable.tooltip: Taunt when follow target taunts.

AutoVariable.label: Activation Range
AutoVariable.tooltip: Max distance to follow a target

AutoVariable.label: Follow distance
AutoVariable.tooltip: Distance to follow target

AutoVariable.label: Mimic slot
AutoVariable.tooltip: Mimic target's weapon slot.

AutoVariable.label: Always Medigun
AutoVariable.tooltip: Always have the medigun out. Overrides mimic slot.

AutoVariable.label: AFK limit
AutoVariable.tooltip: Time a target must be AFK for to switch from them.

AutoVariable.label: SteamID to follow
AutoVariable.tooltip: Steamid of player to follow. Highest priority.

AutoVariable.label: Prioritize friends
AutoVariable.tooltip: Thrid highest priority.

AutoVariable.label: Draw crumbs
AutoVariable.tooltip: Draw follow path

AutoVariable.label: Nope!
AutoVariable.tooltip: Have the charachter say 'no'.

AutoVariable.label: Enable warp
AutoVariable.tooltip: Allows you to charge a burst of speed.

AutoVariable.label: Warp speed
AutoVariable.tooltip: The discharge speed (0.5 = +50%, 2 = +200%. +2300% is the maximum possible).

AutoVariable.label: Warp key
AutoVariable.tooltip: Pressing this key will use all stored ticks to accelerate you.

AutoVariable.label: Draw warp
AutoVariable.tooltip: Draws a bar indicating your warp readiness.

AutoVariable.label: Charge passively
AutoVariable.tooltip: Charge warp passively, e.g. when moving

AutoVariable.label: Charge in jump
AutoVariable.tooltip: Charge passively in jump, This will make you fall slower

AutoVariable.label: Charge when keys released
AutoVariable.tooltip: Charge passively before full stop after releasing movement keys

AutoVariable.label: Movement ratio
AutoVariable.tooltip: Every nth movement tick is passively converted to warp

AutoVariable.label: Demoknight mode
AutoVariable.tooltip: This will make you do a swing charge with warp (attack, charge, warp).

AutoVariable.label: Peek mode
AutoVariable.tooltip: This will teleport you for a tick and then teleport you back

AutoVariable.label: Warp when hit
AutoVariable.tooltip: Whenever Someone Melees you or shoots you with hitscan, warp

AutoVariable.label: Warp forwards
AutoVariable.tooltip: Warp when hit option

AutoVariable.label: Warp backwards
AutoVariable.tooltip: Warp when hit option

AutoVariable.label: Warp left
AutoVariable.tooltip: Warp when hit option

AutoVariable.label: Warp right
AutoVariable.tooltip: Warp when hit option
